page_title_en: Nice Black Friday Deal Drops Sony Pulse 3D Headset To 69
page_description_en: The stylish Pulse 3D headset gets a big discount.
page_text_html:
There's no shortage of quality headsets available right now, but if you're looking to grab something for your PS5 and keep the branding on point, then you're going to want to look at this Black Friday deal for the Sony Pulse 3D wireless headset.

See at Amazon

The official audio cans for the PS5, the Pulse 3D combines a wireless design with an eye-catching white finish that perfectly matches the aesthetics of the PS5 console. Usually retailing for $100, you can grab either the Midnight Black or the white set for just $69 at Amazon right now.

That's a very attractive deal for a headset that packs a lot of quality into its frame, as it takes advantage of the proprietary Tempest 3D AudioTech in the PS5 to pipe immersive sound directly into your noggin. In addition to the headset, you'll also get a USB wireless adapter, a USB-C charging cable, and a 3.5mm audio cable.

While the battery can last up to 12 hours from a full charge, you can also switch to reliable analog through the DualSense controller in case you're running low on juice. As an added bonus, you can also use this headset with PS4, PC, and Mac, getting some extra platform range out of your purchase.

"There are better headsets out there, and perhaps many that are more comfortable, but at $100, Sony has hit a price that is hard to beat for the vivacious and rich audio experience that the Pulse delivers," Mat Paget wrote in GameSpot's Sony Pulse 3D headset review. If you're looking for more PlayStation deals, you can check out our roundups on more PS5 gaming headset specials, the best PS5 Black Friday discounts currently available, and the huge savings on DualSense controllers.
